body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia       Sequoia & Kings Canyon Facebook Photo Contest Thanks to all who participated in the 2015 contest! Look for information about next year's contest in early January 2016. And if you're planning to visit the parks, bring your camera!  Photo Gallery View images from our parks' photo collection.  Park Video Watch short films to learn about the parks and plan your trip, or watch our video tours of park trails. Interactive Features See before-and-after photos of the restoration of Giant Forest.
title: Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks: Photos & Multimedia
